mapper.select: select product.* from (select rownum num, p.* from products_info p) product where num between #{pageNo} * #{amount}-9 and #{pageNo} * #{amount}
select product.* from (select rownum num, p.* from products_info p) product
select board.* from (select rownum num, pboard.* from (select * from product_board) pboard)board where num between #{pageNo} * #{amount}-9 and #{pageNo} * #{amount}
select count(*) from product_board
select count(*) from products_info
select rownum num, board.* from (select pboard.* from product_board pboard where pboard_unit_enabled = '0' order by TO_NUMBER(pboard_unit_price) asc) board
select * from products_info where product_category=#{product_category}
select * from products_info where product_id in (select product_id from product_board where pboard_unit_condition = #{pboard_unit_condition})
select board.* from (select rownum num, pboard.* from product_board pboard)board where pboard_unit_no=#{pboard_unit_no}
select * from products_info where product_id=#{product_id}
mapper.insert: insert into products_info(product_id, file_pictureId, product_manufacturer, product_name, product_category, product_color, product_description) values (products_sequence.nextval, #{file_pictureId}, #{product_manufacturer}, #{product_name}, #{product_category}, #{product_color}, #{product_description, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select distinct code_value from code_info where code_type = #{code_type} and code_value like '%'||#{code_value}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into code_info(code_no, code_type, code_value) values(code_sequence.nextval, #{code_type}, #{code_value})
mapper.select: select distinct product_category, product_manufacturer, product_name, product_id, file_pictureId, product_color, product_regdate, product_description from products_info where product_name like '%'||#{product_name}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into product_board(pboard_unit_no, pboard_unit_price, pboard_unit_condition, pboard_unit_stocks, product_id, user_id, file_pictureId, pboard_unit_enabled) values(pboard_sequence.nextval, #{pboard_unit_price}, #{pboard_unit_condition}, #{pboard_unit_stocks}, #{product_id}, #{user_id}, #{file_pictureId}, '0')
mapper.select: select pboard.* from (select board.*, row_number() over(partition by pboard_unit_condition, product_id order by dbms_random.random) each_rank from product_board board where pboard_unit_enabled = '0') pboard where each_rank='1'

select * from products_info where product_id in ( select pboard.product_id from ( select board.*, row_number() over(partition by pboard_unit_condition, product_id order by pboard_unit_updatedate desc, pboard_unit_regdate asc) each_rank from product_board board where pboard_unit_enabled = '0') pboard where each_rank='1')
